Data: {"recipient_id": "c25ad383-d531-4e6a-8401-4f2b0445b49e", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Hi, i need help for rejection of my campaing

I'm sorry to hear that your campaign was rejected. Could you please provide more details about the rejection? For example, did you receive any specific reason for the rejection in an email from Ad Support?

Violation of Advertising Policy - We do not allow ads that use celebrities (in name or image) to promote a product unless they have formally endorsed it. If you wish to run this ad, please provide proper verification of the celebrity’s endorsement.

It looks like your ad was rejected due to a violation of our Advertising Policy regarding the use of celebrities. To resolve this, you will need to provide proper verification of the celebrity’s endorsement. You can find more details about our Ad Policy and guidelines here: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you believe this was a misunderstanding, you can submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com.
Thank you for your feedback. You can click the close icon below to close this widget.
Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
